contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Karl Karmarsch.01.jpg|right|200px]] '''Karl Karmarsch''' (October 17, 1803, [[Vienna]] – March 24, 1879) was a [[Germany|German]] [[educator]], founding director of the Polytechnic School in [[Hanover]], later to become the [[University of Hannover]]. From 1817 to 1823, he was associated with the [[Vienna University of Technology| Polytechnic Institute of Vienna]], where he was a student of [[Georg Altmütter]] (1787-1858). From 1830 until his retirement in 1875, he served as director at Hanover, In 1863, he was elected a foreign member of the [[Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences]]. [[File:Karmarsch Bronzestatue.jpg|left|thumb|Bronze statue of Karmarsch in Hanover]] Karmarsch was a promoter of higher [[technical education]] in Germany, and considered a pioneer of [[mechanical engineering|mechanical technology]].<ref name=AE>[http://www.aeiou.at/aeiou.encyclop.k/k165739.htm Biographical information] @ aeiou Encyclopedia</ref> With [[Johann Joseph von Prechtl]] (1778-1854), he was an editor of a multi-volume [[encyclopedia]] of technology called ''Technologische Encyklopädie oder alphabetisches Handbuch der Technologie, der technischen Chemie und des Maschinenwesens''.<ref>[http://archive.org/details/technologischee03karmgoog Archive.org] Technologische Encyklopädie</ref> Other principal works by Karmarsch include: * ''Grundriß der mechanischen Technologie'', two volumes 1837/41 - Outline of mechanical technology. * ''Geschichte Der Technologie Seit Der Mitte Des Achtzehnten Jahrhundert'', 1872 - History of technology since the mid-eighteenth century.<ref name=AE/> == References == {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.uni-hannover.de/de/universitaet/geschichte/karmarsch/leben/index.php Biographical timeline at Hannover University website] {{de icon}} * [http://de.wikisource.org/wiki/Karl_Karmarsch de.Wikisource] (bibliography) {{Authority control|VIAF=71721020}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Karmarsch, Karl | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = | DATE OF BIRTH = October 17, 1803 | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = March 24, 1879 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Karmarsch, Karl}} [[Category:1803 births]] [[Category:1879 deaths]] [[Category:German educators]] [[Category:University of Hanover faculty]] [[Category:Members of the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences]] {{germany-academic-bio-stub}}
